title: Paul Hollywood’s mince pies
description: These easy deep mince pies with readymade mincemeat are so delicious. No soggy bottoms, please.Equipment and preparation: You will need a deep muffin mould with 12 holes, a round pastry cutter and a fluted pastry cutter.
ingredients: 125g/4oz caster sugar, plus extra for sprinkling
2 tangerines, zest grated and flesh chopped
